name: TOMMY HOTEL
address: 158 Núi Ngọc, Đảo Cát Bà, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm ở Đảo Cát Bà, cách Bãi biển Cat Co 1 14 phút đi bộ, TOMMY HOTEL nhìn rathành phố. Ngoài nhà hàng, khách sạn 3 sao này còn có các phòng với điều hòa được trang bị Wi-Fi miễn phí, trong đó mỗi phòng đều có phòng tắm riêng. Chỗ nghỉ này cung cấp dịch vụ phòng, quầy lễ tân 24 giờ và dịch vụ thu đổi ngoại tệ cho khách.

Tại khách sạn, phòng nào cũng có tủ quần áo và TV màn hình phẳng. Tại TOMMY HOTEL, các phòng được thiết kế có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Chỗ nghỉ có phục vụ bữa sáng thực đơn à la carte, kiểu Mỹ hoặc kiểu Á mỗi buổi sáng.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần chỗ nghỉ bao gồm Bãi biển Cát Cò 2, Bãi biển Cat Co 3 và Cannon Fort. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Cát Bi, cách TOMMY HOTEL 54 km.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive: Phục vụ tốt nhiệt tình hết mình cho 10 điểm không có nhưng

review.rating: Tuyệt vời.tôi sẽ quay lại và giới thiệu cho bạn bè
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Có điều hoà 2 chiều.

review.rating: Terrific host. Loved our 3 nights in Cat Ba more than anywhere else in Vietnam
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive: Really helpful manager who assisted with travel arrangements and a fabulous trek/ bike ride/ kayaking day. Special commendation for the delicious rice pancake for breakfast. Amazing value for money
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Nice newer hotel in Cat Ba
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive:
Newer hotel with clean rooms, and good facilities. Good price for what you get.

Tours can be booked through the reception at good prices compared to what can be booked online, so it saves the trip to a local booking office within Cat Ba.

Beds were clean and big, good clean pillows and linens.  We personally prefer a softer mattress though.
review.comment_negative:
During weekends (such as Saturday when we stayed), it can get noisy from locals that come visit the island and party with music and karaoke until very late at night.

Not an issue with the hotel, only the noise around when it is loud outside.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có 2 Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Family owned business. 
Good place stay with well maintained hygiene standards.
Very close to the main promenade and restaurants.
Owner very helpful and friendly - offers other services such us local tours and taxi services.
Fresh breakfast served every morning.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive:
Great staff, they are really helpful, the breakfast is good and the bed and shower are really nice ! 

Everything is new and clean. I recommend this place.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: The room was comfortable and clean, staff were incredibly friendly and helpful. Laundry was efficient so that was great.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
Really comfy big beds.
Good, clean bathroom.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: The wifi was strong- was able to work remotely, the room was clean and the staff were very helpful. The staff went out of our way to help.

review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Just perfect, room super clean and beautiful, staff amazingly helpful.

review.comment_positive: Just perfect, room super clean and beautiful, staff amazingly helpful.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive: Phục vụ tốt nhiệt tình hết mình cho 10 điểm không có nhưng

review.rating: Tuyệt vời.tôi sẽ quay lại và giới thiệu cho bạn bè
review.room_type: Phòng Tiêu Chuẩn Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Có điều hoà 2 chiều.

review.rating: Terrific host. Loved our 3 nights in Cat Ba more than anywhere else in Vietnam
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive: Really helpful manager who assisted with travel arrangements and a fabulous trek/ bike ride/ kayaking day. Special commendation for the delicious rice pancake for breakfast. Amazing value for money
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: Nice newer hotel in Cat Ba
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive:
Newer hotel with clean rooms, and good facilities. Good price for what you get.

Tours can be booked through the reception at good prices compared to what can be booked online, so it saves the trip to a local booking office within Cat Ba.

Beds were clean and big, good clean pillows and linens.  We personally prefer a softer mattress though.
review.comment_negative:
During weekends (such as Saturday when we stayed), it can get noisy from locals that come visit the island and party with music and karaoke until very late at night.

Not an issue with the hotel, only the noise around when it is loud outside.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có 2 Giường Cỡ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Family owned business. 
Good place stay with well maintained hygiene standards.
Very close to the main promenade and restaurants.
Owner very helpful and friendly - offers other services such us local tours and taxi services.
Fresh breakfast served every morning.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe (2 Người lớn + 1 Trẻ em)
review.comment_positive:
Great staff, they are really helpful, the breakfast is good and the bed and shower are really nice ! 

Everything is new and clean. I recommend this place.
